title: Unable to connect when in-game patch 7.3 problem
body: Hey guys. Can you please help me. Whenever i get in-game my client never connects properly and it comes up with "unable to connect, please check your internet connection". But my internet connection is fine and i can load youtube etc. I've seen heaps of fixes like firewall, driver updates but i've done all that and it still doesn't work. Somebody please help me!!!!

replies.body: I had the same issue and found out that my net was having problems authenticating a connection, if you're still encountering this issue I'd give your ISP (Internet Service Provider) a call and they will guide you to a fix
Same problem to and I can't open store
getting same problem, massive pain in the butt!
